title: Mahua Moitra "Took Bribes" To Ask Questions In Parliament, Claims BJP MP
description: BJP MP alleges Trinamool's Mahua Moitra "took bribes to ask questions" in parliament from businessman Darshan Hiranandani

title: An Unusual Asset Of Hamas Is Complicating Israel's Retaliation Plan
description: Though Hamas is no match for the technological sophistication of the Israeli army, the group has one very unusual asset: a vast network of secret subterranean tunnels.

title: WC Live: Afghanistan One Wicket Away From Historic Win Over England
description: England vs Afghanistan, ODI World Cup 2023, Live: Harry Brook lost his wicket at the score of 66 as eight-down England fear defeat against Afghanistan

title: As Gaza Deaths Rise, Ice Cream Trucks Double Up As Morgues For Bodies
description: Health officials in the Hamas-run Gaza Strip have resorted to storing the bodies of Palestinians killed by Israeli air strikes in ice cream freezer trucks because moving them to hospitals is too risky and cemeteries are short of space.

title: Gaza Deadline Over, Israel Forces Await Political Nod For Ground Assault
description: The three-hour deadline to evacuate north Gaza long over, the Israeli Defence Forces are now waiting for political green signal for the long-expected ground offensive. A new front meanwhile, is opening up on the border with Lebanon.

title: Tears, Rage And High Drama In Telangana Congress After First List
description: The Telangana unit of the Congress witnessed high drama today after the party released its first list of 55 candidates for the 119 assembly seats in the state.

title: Justin Trudeau's "Happy Navratri" Message Amid Diplomatic Row With India
description: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau has wished "happy Navratri" to the Hindu community in his country amid a diplomatic row with India.

title: Blog: "Use Moral Compass": Father's Letter To Daughter On Israel-Hamas War
description: Israeli forces were Sunday readying for a looming Gaza ground invasion aimed at destroying Hamas, the Palestinian Islamist militant group that unleashed the bloodiest attack in the country's history.

title: Strong Tremors Felt In Delhi, Nearby Areas
description: Earthquake in Delhi-NCR: Delhi and its neighbouring cities were jolted on Sunday afternoon when a 3.1 magnitude earthquake struck Faridabad in Haryana.

title: "Really Moved By..." : Israel Envoy After India's Win Against Pakistan
description: Israeli Ambassador to India Naor Gilon said that he was moved by several Indians showing their "solidarity with Israel by displaying posters during the match."

title: Israel Acting "Beyond Scope Of Self-Defence" In Gaza: China
description: Israel's actions in Gaza have gone "beyond the scope of self-defence" and the Israeli government must "cease its collective punishment of the people of Gaza", China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi said in remarks published Sunday.

title: "Diet Coke, Pizza, Tea" In Bhagwant Mann's Open Debate Dare To Opposition
description: Punjab Chief Minister Bhagwant Mann Sunday accused the opposition party leaders of running away from the November 1 open debate out of fear of being exposed for their "misdeeds."

title: "If Your Uncle's Son Wanted Kohli's Shirt...": Akram Rips Into Babar Azam
description: Virat Kohli gave two Team India shirts to Babar Azam after Pakistan suffered a 7-wicket defeat in the World Cup clash at Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad.

title: Congress Fields 'Ramayana' Actor To Face Madhya Pradesh Chief Minister In Polls
description: The Congress has fielded popular actor Vikram Mastal against Madhya Pradesh Chief Minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan in the upcoming assembly elections.

title: ''We Are Suffocating'': Chilling Texts Of Israeli Family Killed By Hamas
description: ''They're here. They're burning us. We're suffocating,'' Yonatan Kedem Siman Tov texted his sister Ranae Butler.

title: "If You Can't Win, At Least...": Ramiz Raja Tears Into Pakistan Team
description: The defeat was also Pakistan's eighth successive loss in ODI World Cups to India, and Ramiz Raja said Pakistan would have to find a way to end the unwanted streak.

title: "Seemed Like BCCI...": Pakistan Team Director On Loss Against India
description: The India vs Pakistan ODI Cricket World Cup 2023 match was being played at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad and it was a sea of blue jerseys

title: Watch: Kohli's Priceless Reaction After Rahul Wins 'Best Fielder Award'
description: India's wicketkeeper KL Rahul was named the best fielder of the match by team's fielding coach T Dilip. Virat Kohli's reaction post that was priceless.

title: Amitabh Bachchan Says He Won't Be Able To Visit Mount Kailash, PM Responds
description: PM Modi also added that Mr Bachchan's visit to the Statue of Unity in Vadodara is also due.
